phrs.translation: 可玩性, 可打性, 舒适性指数
可玩性和玩家体验研究

sentences.sentence: Besides the modern designed, with high playability toys, the other most impressive toys are with the idea of environment-friendly.
sentences.translation: 此次展会最为引人瞩目的除了那些设计新颖，可玩性高的玩具，就属与“环保”有关的玩具了。

sentences.sentence: These gamers actively seek out companies who produce games and offer to test their upcoming release for bugs, playability and other features.
sentences.translation: 他们积极寻找公司合作，一些游戏出品商需要对即将发布的游戏进行测试，以求发现漏洞，考察其可玩性和其他特征。

sentences.sentence: Cheating not only impacts the fairness and decreases the playability of games, but also violate the benefits of the players and the game service providers.
sentences.translation: 欺骗的存在不仅影响了游戏的公平性，降低了游戏的可玩性，而且严重侵害了玩家和游戏运营商的利益。
